mapper.select: SELECT subNo, m.memberNo, substart, subend, subtype, paid_amount, paid_at, firstmail, name, email FROM subscript s JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo ORDER BY paid_at DESC
SELECT NVL(SUM(paid_amount), 0) paid_amount FROM subscript s WHERE TO_CHAR(paid_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT NVL(SUM(paid_amount), 0) paid_amount FROM subscript s WHERE TO_CHAR(paid_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM subscript WHERE TO_CHAR(substart, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')) AND TO_CHAR((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)),'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM subscript WHERE TO_CHAR(substart, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1),'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')) AND TO_CHAR((LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1))),'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT golamount FROM Sales_goals WHERE TO_CHAR(golsdate, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(goledate, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')
SELECT SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM subscript WHERE TO_CHAR(paid_at, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')
mapper.update: UPDATE Sales_goals SET golamount = #{golamount} WHERE TO_CHAR(golsdate, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')
mapper.select: SELECT newsNo, title, hitCount, categoryNo FROM news
SELECT COUNT(*) dataLike, n.newsNo, title FROM newsLike l JOIN news n ON n.newsNo = l.newsNo GROUP BY title, n.newsNo ORDER BY dataLike DESC

SELECT SUM(paid_amount) sum_paid_amount, TO_CHAR(substart, 'YYYY-MM-DD')substart FROM subscript WHERE TO_CHAR(substart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(substart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY substart DESC
SELECT Count(m.memberNo) dataMember, NVL(subtype, 0) subtype FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN subscript s ON s.memberNo = m.memberNo GROUP BY subtype
